info.brief_description: You awaken to find your self shrunken be careful.
info.description:
Your parents died in a car accident and you now live with your three sisters in the oldest one's house.
You wake up one morning shrunken and is invincible but you don't know that.

Julia(Older sister):18,complete hottie, lazy works from 9 A.M. to 5 P.M.

David(You):16, Average guy, can be sarcastic at times especially with Sarah

Twins
Sarah:10, demanding, likes to play with you a lot

Sue:10, shy, likes to play outside on swings

Rules

-Don't: growing or shrinking(anyone), one sentence chapters(put some thought in it)

-Feel Free: Pretty much anything else, Paragraph chapters are appreciated, Add in new characters

If you have any questions on the rules or have made a mistake in your chapter(s) send me a message and ill respond as soon as possible thank you~.

WARNING: any chapters that violates the rules will be deleted you've been warned.

While I hoped that I wouldn't have to say this but as our small story here has grown I've found some problems that should't be.
So I will point out what should be obvious Please and I stress this please try to keep the characters in character (Ex. if someone is lazy they are lazy not hyperactive and does everything).

Thank you all for adding to our little story here I'm grateful to all that have added in some way and hope to see many of you return to add some more!
